page.title: 05CROPS 2 Melton Ross & Elsham
page.content: (continued) (c)stockfeed (d)exports SUGAR BEET Most of the farms grow sugar beet which is grown under contract for British Sugar. The nearest factory is at Brigg. Two of the farmers share a sugar beet harvester with a neighbour. POTATOES Some of these are grown under contract for the food processing market (e.g.frozen foods), and some for the ware market. The potatoes are mostly stored and sold throughout the winter; a few are exported. PEAS All the farms grow peas.The farmers are members of farming co_operatives which sell the peas under contract to a major food processor for freezing Frozen peas are also exported.
